TopicTitle: Hiding or moving singular parts of the UI

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

With the delays in 1.1 and the Unity and GUI updates is anyone interested in looking at moving or removing only the staging icons. I'm not sure it is even possible.

Peace.

----

Original Post

I was wondering if there was a mod that would let you move or remove any of the UI, such as moving or removing the engine and staging icons and fuel gauges from the left side of the screen, but leaving the rest? Perhaps like a limited F2 option?

If not, is it possible? And would someone be willing to make it?

If not removing staging icons, then perhaps running them along the top of the screen (moving the altimeter in the process and having the fuel gauges come out below the icons.) Ultimately what it could be used for (besides personal preferences) is creating a clear frame across your display for recording cinematics and so on, while still having all information available to controlling your craft.

I know that Enhanced Navball allows scaling and moving the navball about, but I'm looking for the other graphic items.

Thanks and Peace.

Edited October 7, 2015 by theJesuit
A bump and reopening of the request
I really don't have time now, but I'll experiment in the future.

Wider Contracts App does this sort of UI trickery, although the goal is to change the size, rather than removing UI elements. However, the same concepts should apply.

The massive caveat though is that this will change a fair bit with the under the hood UI rework that is happening. So until 1.1 drops, I wouldn't even consider anything along these lines.
